## kl device set-namespace

set namespace of selected device

### Synopsis

```
Set namespace of selected device
Examples:
  # set namespace of selected device
	kl device set-namespace <namespace>

	# alternative way
	kl device set-ns <namespace>

  # set namespace of selected device to selected environment

```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for set-namespace
  -h, --help   help for set-namespace
```
